tool_description: Maps and validates feature configurations for subscription plans, ensuring feature dependencies and constraints are properly handled.

plan_tier.description: Plan tier level: basic, standard, premium, enterprise

requested_features.description: List of feature identifiers to include in the plan

exclude_features.description: List of feature identifiers to explicitly exclude

allow_tier_override.description: Whether to allow features above the plan tier

error_messages: Invalid plan_tier: Must be one of [basic, standard, premium, enterprise].
Empty requested_features: Must specify at least one feature.
Feature not found: One or more requested features do not exist in the system.
Dependency violation: Some features require other features that are not included.
Tier constraint violation: Requested features exceed the plan tier limits and tier override is disabled.
Conflicting features: Some requested features cannot be used together.
usage: Specify plan_tier and requested_features array. Optionally provide exclude_features, and set check_dependencies and allow_tier_override flags as needed.

valid_features.description: List of validated feature identifiers that can be included

added_dependencies.description: Additional features automatically added due to dependencies

rejected_features.description: Features that were rejected due to constraints

feature_count.description: Total number of features in the final configuration
